name: Transcendent Automaton
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Maguu Kenki, equip this card.
After Maguu Kenki equips this card, immediately use Blustering Blade once.
After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Blustering Blade, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Frosty Assault.
(You must have Maguu Kenki in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2501]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2501] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S25012]</color> once.
After your $[A2501], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S25012]</color>, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your $[A2501], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S25013]</color>.
(You must have $[A2501] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Maguu Kenki</color>, equip this card.
After Maguu Kenki equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Blustering Blade</color> once.
After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blustering Blade</color>, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frosty Assault</color>.
(You must have Maguu Kenki in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: That unerring strike has been delivered countless times.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Maguu Kenki at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
